title: Making a clash team/LF Team
body:
Made a post previously about wanting to join a team as a d3 ad/jg, but as the date goes on the uncertainty rises of being able to actually play in clash. Pretty much just looking for players who are willing to commit to participating for clash. I don't care what rank, as long as we're able to play 5's with consistency. 

My best to worst roles would be ad/jg/support/top/mid so i guess i'd be looking for everything but ad, but i'll take anything i can get.

Just post your deets down below and i'll add you when i can.

EDIT:

Positions taken: 
Sauceyfish: Fill
ImNotTryingToInt: Mid


Positions Needed:
Jg,Ad,Support,Top

replies.body: Hi :) im a current jg main and ex adc main  was previously ranked d4 but when i transitioned to jg i deranked hope to join !! can play 24/7
